item.title: Grandpa Takes Granddaughters Creek Camping!
item.description: It’s adventure time by the creek! Watch Grandpa and the girls enjoy nature, campfire fun, and a peaceful family getaway.

media:content.media:title: Grandpa Takes Granddaughters Creek Camping!
media:content.media:description: It’s adventure time by the creek! Watch Grandpa and the girls enjoy nature, campfire fun, and a peaceful family getaway.

item.title: Family Boom Day with Grandpa and the Granddaughters
item.description: Nothing beats quality time outdoors! Grandpa and the girls team up for a fun and safe Tannerite target day on the farm.

item.title: The Girls Packed the Tannerite, Grandpa Sent It Flying
item.description: A family day to remember — the girls handle the Tannerite while Grandpa makes sure the boom doesn’t disappoint!

item.title: Grandpa and the Girls Go Big with Tannerite
item.description: A lighthearted day on the range turns into a loud and laughter-filled family moment as Grandpa and the girls have fun with some safe Tannerite blasting.

item.title: Bass, Beavers, and Bucks — A Day Outdoors
item.description: An action-packed day exploring nature — from fishing and spotting wildlife to catching glimpses of deer in their element.

item.title: Granddaughters Deer Hunt! Will They Get Lucky?
item.description: A family hunting trip turns into a day full of excitement and memories — will the granddaughters spot their first deer?

item.title: This Freightliner Was Lost In The Bushes For 17 Years!
item.description: A long-lost Freightliner truck is finally uncovered after 17 years. See how it looks and what it takes to bring it back to life.

item.title: Grandpa Takes on the Twin Granddaughters: Sniper Challenge!
item.description: It’s a friendly showdown between grandpa and the twins — who’s got the better aim in this lighthearted family challenge?

item.title: Getting Ready for Deer Season — Family Style
item.description: Grandpa teams up with his granddaughters to prep for deer season, mixing tradition, laughter, and a few great lessons.

item.title: Getting Ready for Deer Season — Family Style
item.description: It’s a friendly showdown between grandpa and the twins — who’s got the better aim in this lighthearted family challenge?

item.title: Deer Season Prep With the Granddaughters
item.description: A heartwarming day in the woods as grandpa and his granddaughters get ready for deer season — family, fun, and fresh air.

item.title: Bass Battle: Granddaughters Go Head To Head
item.description: Two granddaughters go head-to-head in a spirited bass fishing competition — who will reel in the biggest catch?

item.title: Granddaughters Compete For Bass Fishing Braggin’ Rights
item.description: Family fun meets friendly rivalry as the granddaughters cast their lines in a lively bass fishing showdown.

item.title: A Day of Shark Fishing at Sea
item.description: Experience the thrill of shark fishing as we head offshore for an unforgettable day on the water. Safety, skill, and excitement combined.

item.title: Fishing in a 100-Year-Old Boat!
item.description: Join a nostalgic fishing trip aboard a century-old boat — where timeless craftsmanship meets peaceful waters and great catches.

item.title: Starting a 70-Year-Old Farm Tractor Again
item.description: The twins take on a vintage challenge — bringing a 70-year-old tractor back to life and hearing it run for the first time in decades.

item.title: Hunting for Bronco Parts at the Junkyard
item.description: The twins head to a local junkyard in search of Bronco parts, uncovering hidden gems and surprises for their project truck.

item.title: Attract Big Bucks with Food Plots!
item.description: Learn how food plots can draw in more deer this season — from seed selection to setup for the best hunting results.

item.title: Twins’ First Bowfishing Trip: Aiming for Flounder, Hitting Something Wild
item.description: The twins join their first bowfishing trip, aiming for flounder but reeling in an unexpected surprise along the way.

item.title: Heritage Rifle Challenge: Twins or Grandpa?
item.description: A classic rifle brings generations together in a friendly competition — will Grandpa’s experience or the twins’ energy win the day?
